short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write small website-specific memos that get displayed once you revisit those websites. Remind yourself about anything.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SiteMemo helps you remember whatever you need to remember about any website.

Supports multiple memos. Each memo can be displayed on one or more websites.
